summary: Retexture of a Beauti Hair pack found on the Internetz. DL Link in description
descriptionHtml:
My other: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25130]Sir Crocoliles Hook[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22012]Garrisons Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17064]The Alligator[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383]Green Dragon Crescent Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16193]Bleach weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15268]D-Greyman weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14786]Soul Eater weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14968]Stormbringer[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14616]Black Sword, Yoru[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14020]Rorona Zorros Katanas[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400]My Coolsims retexture mod[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4734]Vampire Gameplay Overhaul[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5521]Rans and Yinsiyue Hairstyles Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6720]Kuma Kuma Kokuma Hair and Bagserk Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7752]Iron Claw Daggers Fist Weapons Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12797]Soulfang & Darkfang[/url]

======================================================================
Please read the whole wall of text , i wanted to make it Narrensicher (google it) ;) ) u have to download something from an other site!
Right click new tab on pics for better compare
======================================================================
[size=+2]
-> 1. Description
-> 2. Install
-> 3. Recommend Downloads
-> 4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
-> 5. Credits[/size]

===================================
1. Description
===================================
Read carefully please:
======================

Found these on an Asien site (the site itselfe doesnt host it, its an external link) and tried to concat somebody if i can upload it here for non Chinesespeaking people but failed. Credit goes to the uploader there, since the asien site credits him too. (that was readable ;) )


===================================
2. Install
===================================

!Before install!
================

Save your Coolsims or whatever Hair mod u use.
Delete all old version from Beautiful Hair and my Textures before installing new.

========
Install:
========

(If a popup opens and it looks like u should register, load again. goes without)

Newest verion
================

http://www.mediafire.com/download/1l73tr28lv8hylj/Beautiful+Hair+集合包+v.1.3.7.7z


Old version
================

[url=http://dl.dbank.com/c06a4f5w10]Beautiful Hair 1.2[/url] Asian mirror
[url=http://dynvar.com/skyrim/Beautiful_Hair_v.1.2.7z]Beautiful Hair 1.2[/url]


================
Beautiful Hair Version 1.2/1.3 + My Pack X version
================

<> 1: Download and Extract Beautiful Hair Version 1.2, u get a folder named Beautiful Hair (Asian signs) v.1.2 with again a folder named Beautiful Hair (Asian signs) v.1.2, copy the data in there over to your skyrim dir.

<> 2: Download my Pack and extract into Skyrim dir. Override existing Files. its only the textures.

<> 3: Dont forget to activate the .esp file in the Launcher!

Done


===================================
3. Recommend Downloads
===================================

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6483]Custom NON-VANILLA Hair for NPCs Tutorial by hulebjoern[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923]Extended Slider Colors by Expired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_60 Beta 1_7 by foretrenty[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131]FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2531]AntiFREEZE performance patch 9 ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov[/url]

===================================
4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
===================================

Floating, to deep sitting or through helmets clipping Hairstyles? (Style 00,22,23,24)
Go to Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetshairBeauitiful hair
Copy any HairlineXX.nif and rename the new to Hairline00.nif, hairline22.nif etc
---
In Beautiful Hair version 1.2 there is an .esp file that add the styles to the vanilla one.
1 or 2 styles werent shown in my game.
if u have the same problem. delete the .esp

copy contents of Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetshairBeauitiful hair

to

Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetshairfemale
---
You can use the Hairstyles for men too. go to Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/female copy contents, make new dir in Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair named Male so its Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male past in,

have fun ;)

Each pack changes your vanilla Hairtextur. so u have 3 new textures for the vanilla styles, too.

===================================
5. Credits

===================================

Since i found some files in the Pack named Ren and Corean i credit them too. but if u want to change

something in the pack and release it, contact the uploader first please.

===================================
[credit]
===================================

zfjoezf (uploader, perhaps creator)
Thanks to AnOldFriend

===================================
[credit]
===================================

Corean mod - made by idkrrr-
Thanks to Bethesda Softworks.
Thanks to My hero 'Ren'
(This mod started from Mystic Elf, Many files of this mod is based on Mystic Elf.
I learned many knowledge from her Blog. and If there were no Mystic Elf, Also there were no Corean)
Thanks to Corean mod Tester 'chris(sscss2)'
Thanks to My Family(Elder scrolls naver Cafe: http://cafe.naver.com/elderscrolls7.cafe)

You may use and distribute the models and textures freely without additional permission as long as

the above credits are included.

===================================
Credits & Usage
===================================

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks.
Thanks to Capucine for the help about making colourable hair.
Thanks to Daeger and Ranma-chan for fixing texture pathes of meshes.

All of the meshes and textures are made by Ren.

You may use and distribute the models and textures freely without
additional permission as long as the above credits are included.
